metadata.title: Reports & Statistics
metadata.description: Gain valuable insights into your events with comprehensive reporting and analytics. Make data-driven decisions and optimize your event planning process.

title: Reports & Statistics
subtitle: Gain valuable insights into your events with comprehensive reporting and analytics. Make data-driven decisions and optimize your event planning process.

dashboards.title: Comprehensive Dashboards
dashboards.description: Get a complete overview of your events with customizable dashboards. Monitor key metrics such as budget utilization, participant numbers, and supplier performance at a glance.

budgetTracking.title: Budget Tracking
budgetTracking.description: Track your event budgets in real-time. Compare planned vs. actual expenses, identify cost-saving opportunities, and ensure you stay within budget for all your events.

customReports.title: Custom Reports
customReports.description: Create custom reports tailored to your specific needs. Filter and segment data by event type, date range, department, or any other criteria to get the insights that matter most to you.

financial.title: Financial Reports
financial.description: Get detailed insights into your event finances with our comprehensive financial reports. Track expenses, compare quotes, and analyze cost trends across all your events.

participant.title: Participant Reports
participant.description: Analyze participant data to better understand your audience and improve future events. Track registration rates, attendance, and participant feedback.

supplier.title: Supplier Performance Reports
supplier.description: Evaluate supplier performance to make informed decisions for future events. Track response times, pricing, and quality ratings for all your suppliers.

strategic.title: Strategic Reports
strategic.description: Get the big picture with strategic reports that help you identify trends, optimize your event planning process, and make data-driven decisions.

fileFormats.title: Multiple File Formats
fileFormats.description: Export your reports in various formats including PDF, Excel, CSV, and PowerPoint. Choose the format that works best for your needs and easily share with stakeholders.

scheduledReports.title: Scheduled Reports
scheduledReports.description: Set up automated report delivery on a schedule that works for you. Receive daily, weekly, or monthly reports directly in your inbox, ensuring you always have the latest data.

teamSharing.title: Team Sharing
teamSharing.description: Share reports with team members, stakeholders, and suppliers directly from the platform. Control access levels and ensure everyone has the information they need.

dataDriven.title: Make Data-Driven Decisions
dataDriven.description: Base your event planning decisions on solid data rather than gut feelings. Our comprehensive reports provide the insights you need to optimize your events and improve outcomes.

demonstrateRoi.title: Demonstrate ROI
demonstrateRoi.description: Clearly show the return on investment for your events. Provide stakeholders with detailed reports that demonstrate the value and impact of your events.

costSaving.title: Identify Cost-Saving Opportunities
costSaving.description: Analyze spending patterns to identify areas where you can reduce costs. Compare supplier prices, optimize participant numbers, and eliminate unnecessary expenses.

improveFuture.title: Improve Future Events
improveFuture.description: Learn from past events to continuously improve. Analyze what worked well and what didn't to make each event better than the last.

cta.title: Ready to gain valuable insights from your events?
cta.description: Join organizations that use Event Logic's reporting tools to make data-driven decisions and optimize their event planning process.
